title: F/S: Rare 1887 International League Schedule + BONUS -$80.00  Postpaid

posts.post_title: F/S: Rare 1887 International League Schedule + BONUS -$80.00  Postpaid
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Adam Baxter
F/S: Rare 1887 International League Schedule -$100 Postpaid
June 20 2007 at 5:58 PM 
Adam Baxter   (Login AdamBaxter) 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
Rare 1887 International League Pocket Schedule. There are, I believe, a couple of teams from the IL in the N172 Old Judge set (Hamilton, Rochester, etc.. 

League Notes section on back cover mentions O.P. Caylor, Albert Spalding, National League, International League conforming to National Association rules on blacklisting players. 

Made of fairly thin paper, measures 3" x 6". Great graphic on the front of a batter at the plate with catcher behind him. Never seen another one of these. 


Pics with close-ups available here:

[url]http://s183.photobucket.com/albums/x253/ajbaxter/[/url]

CONDITION:Has portion of the lower left corner of the front missing and some light creases throughout mostly at foldline otherwise VG condition. 

Asking $75.00 postpaid (Priority/Ins./DC) + plus bonus two fair condition Rube Marquard sheet music booklet in fair condition
  
Payment: Paypal (Preferred) to AJohnBaxter@aol.com

*** FIRST POST ON THE BOARD GETS IT,NO EMAILS PLEASE, THANKS.***
